title: 3 and Out - CFB Week 1 Takes, Rams Red Flag, Baker/Lamar Extension Calls, Make or Break QB's, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - CFB Week 1 Takes, Rams Red Flag, Baker/Lamar Extension Calls, Make or Break QB's, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to College Football's opening weekend, including Bama dominating again despite losing stars from last years title team, and Florida State QB McKenzie Milton's inspirational comeback from a potentially career-ending leg injury (1:00). He also explains why he's not sold on the Rams D (19:00), if extending Baker Mayfield and Lamar Jackson is the smart move (29:00) how COVID DNP's will affect the way he gambles on games (35:00), which 3 QB's are facing make or break 2021's (43:00), and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag (48:00).

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
